package.name: vaibhavpandeyvpz/tez
package.description: Tez Framework, a VC extension to Slim micro-framework providing Controllers, CsrfValidation, Smarty/Twig/Plates Views and lot more

dev-master.name: vaibhavpandeyvpz/tez
dev-master.description: Tez Framework, a VC extension to Slim micro-framework providing Controllers, CsrfValidation, Smarty/Twig/Plates Views and lot more

suggest.ircmaxell\/password-compat: Required for using BcryptEncoder class pre php 5.6
suggest.league\/plates: Required to use Plates powered templates
suggest.pimple\/pimple: Required for using centralized services in Console app
suggest.smarty\/smarty: Required to use Smarty powered templates
suggest.twig\/twig: Required to use Twig powered templates
